question: The 39th International Trade Fair-2019 has started recently under which theme?
explanation:
The 39th India International Trade Fair is to begin in New Delhi on November 14, 2019. Around 25,000 people are expected to visit the fair.
Theme: “Ease of Doing Business”. The theme is inspired from India’s 63rd rank in the World Bank’s Ease of Doing Business. The Fair is to serve as a convergence point for the government agencies, non-government institutions and private sector enterprises. Countries including Vietnam, UK, Turkey, Tunisia, Thailand, Nepal, Myanmar, Iran, Indonesia, Hong Kong, Egypt, China, Bhutan, Bangladesh, Australia and Bahrain are to participate in the fair. The preferences are given to Bihar and Jharkhand states this year.
